name: Launching Gecks Early Access Download
description:
- Game Content

Twenty levels

- Controls

Hold the spinning gecko and drag it back to launch.

- Notes

There is a small bug that sometimes makes launching a little bit glitchy, I have tried to resolve the problem, but have been unsuccessful at the moment. I will keep trying to fix it and give an update if the problem is fixed.

The end game button at the end does not currently function. I will try and change this in a future update.
